title: A Hard Days Night (1964) (The Beatles)
description:
A HARD DAY'S NIGHT - 1964 (Black and White)

IMDb Rating: 7.5
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0058182/

  Nominated for an Academy Award.

  This was the Beatles at their best. Back when Rock & Roll was up-beat, up-tempo and fun. Long before Drugs and Politics changed the popular culture forever.
  In 1964, the Beatles had just recently exploded onto the American scene with their debut on "The Ed Sullivan Show." This was the group's first feature and offered fans their first peek into a day in the life of the Beatles. It also served to establish the Fab Four on the silver screen, as well as to inspire the music video format. 
  The sound on the speaking parts is, at times, rather tinny sounding. But the vocals (the singing) are great quality.

  Songs: 
  A Hard Day's Night
  I'll Cry Instead
  I Should've Known Better
  Can't Buy Me Love
  If I Fell
  And I Love Her
  I'm Happy Just to Dance with You
  Ringo's Theme (This Boy)
  Tell Me Why
  Don't Bother Me
  I Wanna Be Your Man
  All My Lovin'
  She Loves You

  Starring: John Lennon, Paul McCartney, George Harrison, Ringo Starr.

  Directed by: Richard Lester.

  Quality: Very Good Xvid from DVD.

  Length: 1hr. 24min.

  Language: English.

  Size: 632 x 412
